API Documentation¶

Walker¶

class altwalker.walker.Walker(planner, executor, data, reporter)¶
altwalker.walker.create_walker(planner, executor, data=None, reporter=None)¶

Executor¶

class altwalker.executor.Executor(module)¶
execute_step(class_name, name, *args)¶

Execute the callable and returns the output.

Parameters:
  • class_name – the name of the class.
  • name – the name of the method/function.
Returns:

The output of the callable.
has_step(class_name, name)¶

Check if the module has a callable. If class_name is not None it will check for a method, and if class_name is None it will check for a function.

Parameters:
  • cls_name – the name of the class.
  • name – the name of the method/function.
Returns:

Returns true if the module has the callable.
altwalker.executor.create_executor(path, package='tests', module='test')¶

Planner¶

class altwalker.planner.OnlinePlanner(service, client)¶

Plan a path using the GraphWalker REST service.

class altwalker.planner.OfflinePlanner(steps)¶

Plan a path from a list of steps.

altwalker.planner.create_planner(models=None, steps=None, port=8887)¶

Data¶

class altwalker.data.GraphData(planner)¶

Reporter¶

class altwalker.reporter.Reporter¶

Default reporter.

end(message=None)¶

Report the end of a run.

error(message, trace=False)¶

Report an error.

start(message=None)¶

Report the start of a run.

step_start(step)¶

Report the starting execution of a step.

step_status(step, failure=False, output='')¶

Report the status of a step.

class altwalker.reporter.PrintReporter¶

Output reports to stdout.

class altwalker.reporter.FileReporter(path)¶

Output reports to a file.

class altwalker.reporter.ClickReporter¶

Output reports using the click.echo function.

error(message, trace=False)¶

Report an error.

step_status(step, failure=False, output='')¶

Report the status of a step.

GraphWalker¶

class altwalker.graphwalker.GraphWalkerClient(host='127.0.0.1', port=8887)¶

A client for the GraphWalker REST service.

class altwalker.graphwalker.GraphWalkerService(models=None, port=8887, verbose=True, unvisited=False, blocked=False, output_file=None)¶

Stops and kills a proccess running the GraphWalker REST service.

kill()¶

Send the SIGINT signal to the GraphWalker service to kill the process and free the port.

altwalker.graphwalker.check(models, blocked=None)¶

Execute the check command.

Parameters:
  • models – A sequence of tuples containing the model_path and the stop_condition
  • blocked – Run the command with the blcoked flag.
Returns:

Returns the output form GraphWalker check.
altwalker.graphwalker.methods(model_path, blocked=False)¶

Execute the methods command.

Parameters:
  • model_path – A path to a model.
  • blcked – Run the command with the blcoked flag.
Returns:

A list of unique names of vertices and edges in the model.
altwalker.graphwalker.offline(models, start_element=None, verbose=False, unvisited=False, blocked=None)¶

Execute the offline command.

Parameters:
  • models – A sequence of tuples containing the model_path and the stop_condition
  • start_element – A starting element for the first model.
  • verbose – Run the command with the verbose flag.
  • unvisited – Run the command with the unvisited flag.
  • blocked – Run the command with the blcoked flag.
Returns:

Return a list of steps.
